definition: unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
(negative prefix)/not/no
to demand/to request/to coerce
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: that it's okay to not do great in studio, but you can still succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在工作室学习不太好不要紧，你依然能成功。

sentences.english: 'You're mistaken I daresay. It's no matter.
sentences.chinese: 我想是你弄错了，这不要紧。

sentences.english: Shouted the old black females was such a big deal, the front of the neighbors were awakened.
sentences.chinese: 老黑母兔这么一喊不要紧，把跟前的邻居们都惊醒了。

sentences.english: Nover mind, you'll soon feel better.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧的，你立刻会好的。

sentences.english: It doesn't matter. A big calculator, you know, I am holding you on your honor.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，一个大的计算器，我充分地信任你们。

sentences.english: Ensure hem stich is neat and straight and stitch tension not tight.
sentences.chinese: 确保脚车线整齐和直及线步不要紧。

sentences.english: There was just a little bleeding. Nothing serious.
sentences.chinese: 只是流了一点血，不要紧。

sentences.english: You can write on the edge for all I care.
sentences.chinese: 也可以写在边上，都不要紧。

sentences.english: I practiced hard with my writing so that I could help the scribe copy minor documents for the principal.
sentences.chinese: 我用心的练字，为是能帮助校长抄写些不要紧的东西。

sentences.english: Do not squeeze or pick at the pimples.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧压也不要采摘在丘疹。

sentences.english: Her father nestled her in his arms and asked her not to bother abour it.
sentences.chinese: 父亲把她搂在怀里，安慰她说不要紧。

sentences.english: Will it matter if I am a little late?
Let him be he's doing no harm.
sentences.chinese: 别理他，他不要紧，没事的。

sentences.english: So long as other firms could satisfy consumers’ needs, it would not matter.
sentences.chinese: 只要有其他公司可以满足客户的需要，那就不要紧。

sentences.english: We wanted to get it for good luck, even if we lose money.
sentences.chinese: 他说，我们希望它能带来好运，就算亏了钱也不要紧。

sentences.english: Spend some money does not matter, the body does not pay to eat bad.
sentences.chinese: 花点钱不要紧，吃坏身体划不来。

definition: it doesn't matter
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
important/urgent
at worst/if worst comes to worst/serious/alarming
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
fearless/not worried (by setbacks or difficulties)/even if/even though
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
otherwise/or else/or
no problem
no matter (who, what etc)
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
